website_summaries.verdict: Premium pack of 200 covers (100 pairs) with traction strips. These industrial-grade covers are ideal for commercial and professional use.
pros: Tough polypropylene resists ripping and rupturing, even outdoors
Fits over boots and shoes and stays secure with elastic band
XL fits up to men’s 11.5 and women’s 12.5 shoe sizes
Popular to keep floor clean when contractors work in your home
cons: They do the job, but they don’t come in a dispensing box, so you’ll need to find a convenient way to store them

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Very helpful when it comes to show covers. Lots of time we run out and come back home with dirty show which spoils the who house or the carpet. These covers are very helpful and comes at fraction of what we normally spend for cleaning the carpet. Over all, This is a good product and I highly recommend friends or family give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: Sri Reddy

customer_reviews.title: Just short of wonderful.
customer_reviews.text: Great, tough, easy-fitting, nice looking and excellent coverage for MOST. However, they did not fit over large men’s shoes size 13+.
customer_reviews.author: Some Lady

customer_reviews.title: WRONG DESCRIPTION!
customer_reviews.text: This product IS NOT non-slip. What I got was a small plastic shoe covers all around. Cheap and NOT what is advertised. There is no “non-slip” treads at the bottom of the shoes.
customer_reviews.author: ashley matthias

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: These are so handy for our house. We have 20+ acres so lots of yard work and whatnot. Every time we need to come in and out of the house we have a stash of them by the door and can throw them on to prevent tracking in mud or dirt so that we don't have to take on and off our shoes multiple times! Also great for my dad for work as he is a plumber and uses them to slip on and off when he is at a job and goes into a customers house.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie Lebsock

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: If you need something that won't tear you might want to look elsewhere. These do the basic job - they're paper shoes covers. They tear easier than expected. Easier to use with dress shoes than with boots. Most shoe covers slip & slide on hardwood or vinyl floors. These are no different. They also have the extra material in front and back that can cause you to trip. If you don't have the budget for higher end covers, these are fine. I've also done some quick dusting with them. They do have other uses if you get creative.
customer_reviews.author: DanP Sells Pittsburgh

customer_reviews.title: Buy these!
customer_reviews.text: These are great!! Very durable and fit over work boots!! Perfect for dirty shoes!! I keep them at my front door for everyone! Can’t stand it when people wear their shoes in my house! Best purchase I made all year! You need these if your a clean freak!!
customer_reviews.author: ovimonster

customer_reviews.title: Okay for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Even though these were the extra large, some of them wouldn't fit over the men's shoes and tore when they tried to put them on over their shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Phillylocks
customer_reviews.text: They could have been a tad bit bigger to go over shoes. I purchased to keep my rugs clean from human traffic. Overall, they are great. Merchandise arrived timely.
customer_reviews.author: Phillylocks

customer_reviews.title: Floor Protectors
customer_reviews.text: Could be a little larger for our electrician and water sprinkler workers to get over their boots. Not as water proof as the plastic ones I bought before. For non wet weather they are fine on my white carpeted home.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy C.

customer_reviews.title: Pathetically inferior design
customer_reviews.text: These booties are very poorly designed. They come TO A POINT IN FRONT AND BACK , which can’t conform to your shoe, UNLESS YOU ARE WEARING STYLETOS IN THE OPERATING ROOM! The pointy tips get stepped on as you move around and pull the cover off your shoe. Furthermore, the bottom doesn’t have anti skid material, making them slippery. I WOULD NEVER BY THIS PRODUCT AGAIN!
customer_reviews.author: Monroe Sternlieb

customer_reviews.title: The worst I have seen
customer_reviews.text: I’m a realtor and these are not even close to a decent quality. Basically garbage. Don’t even trust them for a short showing of a small house. Do not even think about it if worried about wet shoes.
customer_reviews.author: L.Y.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my daughters diabetic brace. Makes it not slippery on my hardwood floors.
customer_reviews.author: Simplystitches0

customer_reviews.title: No more asking guests to remove shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These work well. Even stretch to fit my size 14 feet. Wish there were more colors, but if you like blue that would help.
customer_reviews.author: J. Clifton

customer_reviews.title: Not XL
customer_reviews.text: These shoe covers are NOT extra large. I have ordered from other sellers on amazon and the XL were definitely much bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Oramas

customer_reviews.title: Ok!
customer_reviews.text: These are ok. They tear very easily and they won’t fit large shoes such as boots.
customer_reviews.author: 4Eva Shopping

customer_reviews.title: They fall apart
customer_reviews.text: These are terrible. Way to thin and fall apart. Cheap plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Deruss

customer_reviews.title: Runs small!!!
customer_reviews.text: XL does not fit over working boots. Way too small. That was the main purpose for me to buy these.
customer_reviews.author: pauline brown

customer_reviews.title: Keeps unwanted dirt, water, or snow from hard wood floors!
customer_reviews.text: Saved my newly stripped wood floors. Guest had no problem using them
customer_reviews.author: Vett

customer_reviews.title: It does what it's suppose to
customer_reviews.text: It's durable but if you have wide shoes like boots or shoes over size 11, will not work as well.
customer_reviews.author: Earl Bedford

customer_reviews.title: as described
customer_reviews.text: Slight delay in shipping, but got them! As described!! Perfect for Healthcare workers needing protection over the feet
customer_reviews.author: Todd Gakk

customer_reviews.title: They're perfect for our new white carpet!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for guests and ourselves to walk on our new white carpeting.
customer_reviews.author: diana r

customer_reviews.title: Not slip resistant
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my company they look nice fit nicely. However they are not slip resistant it’s like they stamped it with paint it’s not grumpy at all.
customer_reviews.author: Cinthia

customer_reviews.title: NEED TO BE TUFFER
customer_reviews.text: WORK GREAT. COULD BE A LITTLE TUFFER THOUGH. THEY SEEM TO RIP EASY.
customer_reviews.author: GRUBDIGGER

customer_reviews.title: Does what it needs to
customer_reviews.text: Has two layers, preventing tears. Good fit, even up to my size 13.
customer_reviews.author: Smithy Smith

customer_reviews.title: These were present in every way.
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect for my guests. Instead of having to remove their shoes, my guests were simply able to place the covers over them.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Convenience
customer_reviews.text: Guest complain that it is very slippery on wood floors. It requires more traction!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you are a nurse and you want to use at work-don't buy it
customer_reviews.text: The shoe covers are plastic made. It's slippery. The picture in Amazon is deceiving. It's not the same as the ones the hospital provides- with strip on the bottom to make it Not slippery.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Ylsua2

customer_reviews.title: Keeps your boots clean
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband to keep his work boots clean. He is very happy with them and said they do the job.
customer_reviews.author: D. Ali

customer_reviews.title: Good quality & durability for cheap
customer_reviews.text: Quantity & quality for a good price. I used these for entering my birthing dogs kennel
customer_reviews.author: David T. Owens

customer_reviews.title: Durability is the issue.
customer_reviews.text: Product tour easily when I put my shoes In it. Not premium quality as advertised
customer_reviews.author: Karen Montell

customer_reviews.title: Product Performs As Needed
customer_reviews.text: Product received performed well as expected as we required use of during the final construction and move in of our home.
customer_reviews.author: John Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Do not order!
customer_reviews.text: Very poor product! The covers are sewn together, they will not open to put on your shoes... I’m very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I love them. I'm able to wash them in the washing machine and they dont rip apart. I will order more.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste money
customer_reviews.text: A joke. Not even large enough for any men’s shoes. Will fit some women with small shoe sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Muddy Boots Not To Worry
customer_reviews.text: Rock these booties at any model home or inventory open house! My team loves them and uses them daily....great value!
customer_reviews.author: RMG

customer_reviews.title: Will not buy from them again
customer_reviews.text: They were nothing like the picture. Was very disappointed in product
customer_reviews.author: chelsea yarbrough

customer_reviews.title: Helps keep your house clean !
customer_reviews.text: Great to offer the guests who don’t remove their shoes when they come over!
customer_reviews.author: Mara S

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I like the ease of coverage on shoes and the water resistance.
customer_reviews.author: Fernita Allen

customer_reviews.title: Good product so far
customer_reviews.text: Too early to rate dirability yet but all looks ok so far
customer_reviews.author: robert khoury

customer_reviews.title: Product that is worth it
customer_reviews.text: this shoe covers fits my husband's size 10 cowboy boots easy! putting it on is a breeze also, it does stretch enough to fit the big sizes of shoes without tearing it off. We don't have a concrete pathway from the house to the outside so it do gets muddy when it rains. This shoe covers really do it's job and protects our shoes from gettin all muddy. saves us a lot of time from cleaning out our boots from getting dirty.
customer_reviews.author: MT

product_meta.title: Premium Disposable Boot & Shoe Covers 200 Pack (100 Pairs) | Non-Slip, Durable, Indoor | Protect Your Home, Floors and Shoes
product_meta.description:
Why you should choose Tomus-UNI disposable hygienic boot & shoe covers?

- Have an elastic band on the ankle for a secure and universal fit.

- Large foot opening area which makes it easy to slip over your shoes.

The benefits of Tomus-UNI disposable hygienic boot & shoe covers

- Keep your living and working space crystal clear Works great for people that have to take them on and off to go in people's house.

- Extremely easy to open and deploy It has a large foot opening area, which makes it easy to slip over one's shoes.Thick material means you can re-use them if you truly wanted to.

- Cost efficient and safe alternative to disposable shoe covers.

- Great usage in home inspectors, plumbers, carpet cleaners, real estate professionals, painters, maid services, cable and internet companies, glass cleaners.

Specifications:

- Material: polypropylene non woven fabric

- Size: 15.7(L) x 6.69(W) inch （fit up to US Men’s 11.5and US Women’s 12.5 adult shoe sizes）

- Color: Blue

- Package Included: 50 Pairs(100 Pieces in a Pack)

Attention:

- If your shoe size range more than 12, this shoe covers maybe not fit.

- Don't wear them on the surfaces where covered too much water.

- Don't wear them on rough surfaces. If you do, holes will start to appear.
feature_bullets: ★Made of durable non woven fabric, much thicker than normal shoe cover, which is also environmental protection.

★Size: 40X15cm(15.7x 5.9 inch -inch). Package Included: 100 Pairs(200 Pieces in a Pack) Disposable Shoe Covers.Our Large Size industrial-grade covers contain an elastic band for flexibility to fit up to US Men’s above 12 and US Women’s above 13 adult shoe sizes and help keep the covers snug on your feet.

★Keep your carpets or floors clean and protect them against dirt, grime, and certain dry particulates that upset you.It can save you time and money from preventable cleaning expenses. Time and money saved is a win-win

★Non-Slip and Soft to wear. Large foot opening area which makes it easy to slip over your shoes.Our shoe, boot, and sneaker covers are made of thick, long-lasting interwoven polypropylene fabric that resists tearing and rupturing. Despite their strength, they are light and effective at protecting you, your shoes, your carpets, your hardwood floors and tile floorings by keeping it spotless and clean.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars261 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
